tag_list: computer-technical-support, fix-computer, pc-repair, pc-help, online-computer-support, computer-maintenance, computer-repair-technician, computer-support-help
overview: Headquartered in Albany, New York, FastforPC is the fastest growing service provider of Per Incident, Dedicated and Premium Computer Technical Support to consumers and small businesses. FastforPC offers outstanding Windows support to consumers across the globe through its remotely-enabled services. With its highly optimized processes, FastforPC has more than 2000 consumer and small business customers across the USA, Canada, UK and Australia region. FastforPC also provides scores of single incident support sessions every day.
